trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Az'rya's darkvision.

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Az'rya wears {@item Ear Cuff of Eminence|RavensCollection} and wields {@item Maelstrom}.

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: Az'rya makes two attacks or short bursts with {@i Maelstrom}.

action.name: Maelstrom
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 70/210 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) piercing damage, or {@h}22 ({@damage 4d6 + 8}) piercing damage when making a short burst, which uses three pieces of ammunition.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Az'rya is a 20th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 20}, {@hit +12} to hit with spell attacks). She regains her expended spell slots when she finishes a short or long rest. She knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, Stor can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Stor hits with it.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Stor has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Battle Master Maneuvers
entries: Lvl3:
Lvl7:
Lvl10:
Lvl15:

trait.name: Feats
entries: Polearm Master
Sentinel
Heavy Armor Master
Skill Expert (Athletics)
Great Weapon Master?

trait.name: Menacing
entries: Stor has proficiency in the Intimidation skill. (half orc race)

trait.name: Savage Attacks
entries: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit. (half orc race)

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Stor wields a {@item +3 poleaxe}, wears a {@item +3 plate armor} and carries an {@item Orc Thrower|RavensCollection} on his belt. Further: {@item Belt of Storm Giant Strength}, {@item Rope of Entanglement}, {@item Blood Fury Tattoo|TCE}

action.name: Poleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: {@item Orc Thrower|RavensCollection}
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) slashing damage, or 13 ({@damage 1d10 + 8}) slashing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack. If thrown, it deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Enlarge (Duergar)
entries: For 1 minute, Stor magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, Stor is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Stor lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

item.name: Ear Cuff of Eminence
entries: A glistening fire opal, surrounded by white gold filigree set with pearlescent shards of abalone, this piece of jewellery can be set onto the ear.
While you are wearing no armor, your base Armor Class is 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Charisma modifier and you have advantage on saving throws against spell and other magical effects.

item.name: Orc Thrower
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It has the thrown property with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged attack using this weapon or if the target is either {@condition grappled}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition stunned} or {@condition prone}, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage. Immediately after a thrown attack, the weapon flies back to your hand. If you don't have a hand free, the weapon lands at your feet.

item.name: Orc Thrower 2
entries: You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. When you hit with a melee attack using this weapon and the target is either {@condition grappled}, {@condition restrained}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition stunned} or {@condition prone}, it deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage.

entries.name: Thrown Weapon
entries: The Orc Thrower has the thrown property, with a normal range of 20 feet and a long range of 60 feet. When you hit with a ranged weapon attack using it, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage. Each time you throw the weapon, it flies back to your hand after the attack. If you don't have a hand free, the weapon lands at your feet.

item.name: Maelstrom
entries: {@i Maelstrom} is a submachine gun of demonic origin. Its black metal surface is engraved with electrum forming letters of the Infernal script and decorative patterns.
You gain a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. It never requires new ammunition. It is impossible to remove the magazine or retrieve cartridges in any way.
If you have a way to use a submachine gun as your spellfocus, like {@optfeature Improved Pact Weapon}, you gain a +3 bonus to spell attack rolls and the saving throws while holding {@i Maelstrom}.

entries.name: Short Burst
entries: When making an attack with a short burst weapon, you use your choice of semi-automatic mode or burst mode. Semi-automatic uses one piece of ammunition per attack, and burst mode deals 2d6 additional ballistic damage but uses three pieces of ammunition per attack.
